channel.title: [OSRS] OS-PvP | Zulrah | Bossing | Instant PK
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/N3gOBv4.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://os-pvp.com"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://os-pvp.com/client.jar"]Play Now[/URL] [URL=http://"http://os-pvp.com/vote"]Vote[/URL] [URL=http://"https://kbve.com/c/index.php?/forum/151-os-pvp/"]Forums[/URL]
OS-PvP - The ultimate PK experience offers high quality PvP'ing with no lag or delays. Join today and get straight to fighting! All the basic PKing kits can be obtained for free, PK & Voting shops allow for the acquisition of 'higher-quality' items.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/z944iIR.png[/img]
[SIZE=5]Duel Arena[/SIZE] We offer fully functional duel arena including restrictions, obstacles and staking! [SPOILER=Duel Arena] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/39Q7hxw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/39Q7hxw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DweJalc.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SIZE=5]Skilling Area[/SIZE] Skilling can still be done, all stats excluding combat are level 1 and can be trained if you so desire. We offer world-wide skilling including Wilderness skilling area. [SPOILER=Skilling] [img]http://i.imgur.com/s822K1m.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wgr1vSj.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SIZE=5]Bosses[/SIZE] We offer a variety of bosses to obtain rare items, without having to continuously PK. This includes old Runescape bosses and OSRS Bosses for you to thoroughly enjoy maxing out! [SPOILER=Bosses] [img]http://i.imgur.com/olKngBi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jikYa72.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EFxgZOQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oDuvHX9.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]
